segments.text: Take me to the center station , please
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you think you can get me there seven thirty ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We shouldn't have any trouble if we don't get stuck in the traffic jam .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here we are , you still get plenty of time . That's 8.15 $ , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you very much . Here's 10 $ , keep the change , please .
segments.speaker: S2
